doc.title: Ekzekutziya
doc.plot: Part 1.It is early in the morning. Two prison guards get ready for the execution. The first one is younger and it will be his first execution. He's scared. The second executioner is more experienced and tries to calm the young one down. Part 2. After the execution the young prison guard brakes down. This is not helped by an uncooperative driver. Part 3. The Doctor who has done the autopsy of the executed comes to the major who must sign the death certificate. The deputies have messed everything about. Part 4. An executor realizes that carrying his official duties, he has committed a murder. He buries the body of the executed according to the Christian religion.
